Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red-brown pottery jar, the fabric is dark-grey in section, the exterior is covered with a red-brown slip and remains of the end of one line of black-painted hieratic text perhaps giving part of a name.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393494) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393494)
